issue.title: discord.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.20.3 (4994) (CL 1.17.108, DL 2.5.51 )

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

discord

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. AdGuard Base filter block entire discord domain by 
||discord.com^
rule
either update itself or basic function scripts all url blocked.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/916ea943-554c-4fb4-9eb1-935417745afc)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/cb26f312-2448-449c-9195-915d6549f7ca)

</details>


### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://discord.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.com) ### Comment > 1. Run DiscordApplication with AdGuard enabled. > 2. If the channel posts in Discord are loading, perform a reload with command+R. > 3. An error occurs when the channel posts do not load. Username: `@librarian` ### Screenshots

In fact, Japanese is a popular second foreign language in these countries.

issue.body:
